Hello Square World! Healthcare Finances Computer Science
The responsible rules and behaviours designed to keep individuals safe whenever connected to the Internet is the definition of Cyber Security Cyber Safety Cyber Ethics Cyber Space
The responsible rules and behaviours designed to keep individuals safe whenever connected to the Internet is the definition of Cyber Security Cyber Safety Cyber Ethics Cyber Space
Which of the following is appropriate to post online? a picture with you address in it your location a picture of your food your phone number
You receive an email asking for banking information from a company name you do not recognize. What should you do? do not respond and report as spam reply asking for more information give them the information report them to the police
You are online shopping. You come across a shoe store that offers outrageous prices but the website looks old and not updated. What should you do> send the website an email with your information buy from the website do not buy shoes from the website report the website to the police
An unknown website offers a free download of your favorite game. The download asks to make changes to your computer. What should you do? allow the download to make changes stop the download and deny the request redownload and hope it does not ask again download a different game from the website
How can you avoid being a victim of identity theft? do not share information with sketchy websites do not open links from unknown sources be extremely cautious of who you share personal information with all of the above
You are on a website and the website continuously produces pop-ups asking for information about you before using the website. What should you do? give the information continuously try to exit the pop-ups leave the website and do not provide the information give fake information
What qualities make a good password? hard to guess includes little personal information includes capital letters and punctuation as allowed all of the above
You are in an online gaming chat room and someone asks about your personal information such as age and location. What should you do? continue chatting but do not provide information provide information do not provide information and stop chatting give fake information and location
It is ok to provide your phone number and email address to unknown websites. True False
Banks often send emails asking you to disclose sensitive information True False
It is ok to provide your phone number and email address to unknown websites. True False
All websites are safe to use. True False
Passwords should not be reused for different accounts. True False
How much water should a person drink in a day? 13 ounces 8 liters 2 liters 8 ounces
How much water should a person drink in a day? 13 ounces 8 liters 2 liters 8 ounces
What are some things you can do to help support your brain health? doing mental exercises eating nutritious foods physical activity all of the above'
How much physical activity should you on average get a day? 4 hours 1 hour 40 minutes 30 minutes
How many hours of sleep should you on average get per night? 6 hours 8 hours 10 hours 12 hours
What is a sign you are not drinking enough water? dark yellow urine all answers are correct you have a headache you have a dry mouth
Which is a healthy way to deal with stress? yelling at others drinking alcohol physical exercise self harm
How much fruit should you eat a day? half serving 1 serving 2 servings 4 servings
How many vegetables should you eat a day? 1 cup 2 to 2 and a half cups 8 cups 3 to 4 cups
Which is NOT a good way to deal with anxiety? isolating yourself mediation talking it out with a friend positive self talk
Which of the following are good mental health resources suicide prevention hotline online therapy meditation applications All of the above
Tap water is safe to drink. True False
Physical and Mental health are completely unrelated and have no effect on each other. True False
Excessive caffeine can cause heart problems. True False
It is important and healthy to reach out for help if you are struggling True False
Unhealthy foods are ok to consume in moderation. True False
Which of the following is a long term investment? mutual funds government bonds certificates of deposit treasury bills
Which of the following is a long term investment? mutual funds government bonds certificates of deposit treasury bills
What is an interest rate? the profit gained from selling investments the proportion of a loan that is charged as interest to the borrower the deficit between spending and saving the rate of stock portfolio growth
What is a mutual fund? money put aside by the government for citizens past a certain age the proportion of a loan that is charged as interest to the borrower a short term investment with quick returns an investment program funded by shareholders that trades in diversified holdings and is professionally managed
Which of the following is a good financial practice investing in random stocks budgeting income and managing expenses only investing in short term investments with high risk using borrowed money to buy luxuries
How much is a person taxed on their income? 33 percent depends on the amount of income a person earns depends on the age and location of the person 25 percent
How often does a person have to file taxes? every month every 6 months every year every two years
Which of the following is not a type of tax? income tax health tax property tax capital gains tax
Every month a person transfers $200 from their checking account to their savings account. This is an example of a _____. long term investment money shortage short term investment savings plan
What is a stock? an investment program funded by shareholders that trades in diversified holdings and is professionally managed the capital raised by a business or corporation through the issue and subscription of shares a form of fiat money a version of money that can be transferred from bank to bank
What is cryptocurrency? digital currency that can be used to buy goods and services a version of money that can be transferred from bank to bank a physical form of money that is the most commonly used form of currency a low risk, non-volatile form of investment
Spending as much as you earn every month is a good financial practice True False
It is important to understand what you are investing in before you invest. True False
When saving money, it is important to consider the interest rate of where you are saving money. True False
When investing money, it is important to only invest in short term or long term investments, but not both. True False
Budgeting is a good financial practice. True False SelectedWrongActivity View My Scores ViewMyScoresActivity My Scores Return CS Leaderboard View leaderboard Settings SettingsActivity
